query: Qareeb tareen washroom kahan hai?
expected_response: Washroom Gate 3 aur Gate 8 ke qareeb departure lounge mein waqe hain

query: Kya airport par free WiFi hai?
expected_response: Ji haan, poore airport par free WiFi available hai. 'ISB_Airport_Free' network se connect hon

query: Namaz ka kamra kahan mil sakta hai?
expected_response: Namaz ke kamray doosri manzil par Gate 5 ke qareeb waqe hain mardon aur khawateen ke liye alag alag jagah ke sath

query: Kya departure lounge mein koi restaurant hai?
expected_response: Ji haan, humare paas Gloria Jean's, Subway, KFC aur Taste of Pakistan restaurant mein traditional Pakistani khana hai

query: Airport lounge kahan hai?
expected_response: Premium Lounge pehli manzil par Gate 6 ke qareeb waqe hai, lounge pass ya business class ticket ke sath accessible

query: Kya airport mein pharmacy hai?
expected_response: Ji haan, departure hall ke main entrance ke qareeb 24 ghante pharmacy hai

query: Main apna phone kahan charge kar sakta hoon?
expected_response: Charging stations tamam gate seating areas aur food court ke qareeb available hain

query: Kya departure terminal mein ATM hain?
expected_response: ATMs entrance, food court aur main departure hall mein waqe hain

query: Main yaadgari cheezain kahan se khareed sakta hoon?
expected_response: Souvenir shops departure lounge mein Gate 4 aur 7 ke qareeb waqe hain

query: Kya airport mein smoking area hai?
expected_response: Ji haan, designated smoking areas departure lounge se accessible outdoor section mein available hain

query: Information desk kahan hai?
expected_response: Information desks main entrance aur departure hall ke beech mein waqe hain

query: Kya bachon ke liye changing facilities hain?
expected_response: Baby changing stations tamam washrooms mein available hain aur Gate 3 ke qareeb dedicated nursing room hai

query: Main coffee kahan se hasil kar sakta hoon?
expected_response: Gloria Jean's aur Espresso samait coffee shops food court area mein waqe hain

query: Kya currency exchange service hai?
expected_response: Currency exchange counters main entrance ke qareeb aur departure lounge mein waqe hain

query: Wheelchair accessible facilities kahan hain?
expected_response: Wheelchair accessible washrooms aur ramps poore terminal mein available hain, aur wheelchairs information desk se request ki ja sakti hain

query: Kya koi duty-free shops hain?
expected_response: Duty-free shops security ke baad departure lounge mein waqe hain jo cosmetics, perfumes aur electronics offer karti hain

query: First aid center kahan hai?
expected_response: Medical aur first aid center ground floor par Gate 2 ke qareeb waqe hai

query: Kya bachon ka play area hai?
expected_response: Ji haan, kids play zone departure lounge mein Gate 5 ke qareeb available hai

query: Main apna samaan kahan store kar sakta hoon?
expected_response: Left luggage storage facility fee ke iwaz main entrance ke qareeb available hai

query: Kya airport mein bookstores hain?
expected_response: Newspapers, magazines aur books offer karne wali bookshop Gate 6 ke qareeb waqe hai

query: Business center kahan hai?
expected_response: Internet, printing aur meeting rooms ke sath business center Premium Lounge mein available hai

query: Kya main airport par travel insurance hasil kar sakta hoon?
expected_response: Travel insurance counters check-in area ke qareeb available hain

query: Pani ke fountain kahan hain?
expected_response: Water fountains aur refill stations tamam gate areas ke qareeb poore terminal mein waqe hain

query: Kya baggage wrapping service hai?
expected_response: Baggage wrapping service check-in counters ke qareeb thori fee ke liye available hai

query: Main taxi service counter kahan se talash kar sakta hoon?
expected_response: Taxi booking counters arrival area mein hain, lekin aap information desk se pooch sakte hain

query: Kya koi kapron ki dukaanain hain?
expected_response: Fashion aur accessories shops departure lounge shopping area mein waqe hain

query: Lost and found office kahan hai?
expected_response: Lost and found office departure hall mein main information desk ke qareeb hai

query: Kya VIP meet aur greet service hai?
expected_response: VIP meet aur greet services PAA ke sath advance booking ke zariye available hain

query: Main SIM cards kahan se khareed sakta hoon?
expected_response: Mobile phone SIM cards entrance ke qareeb telecom shops par available hain

query: Kya airport ke qareeb koi hotels hain?
expected_response: Airport hotels aur qareeb ki accommodation information desks ya booking counters ke zariye mil sakti hai

query: Jootay saaf karne ki service kahan hai?
expected_response: Shoeshine stands departure lounge mein premium shops ke qareeb available hain

query: Kya main free internet use kar sakta hoon?
expected_response: Ji haan, free WiFi poore mein available hai; internet kiosks business center mein hain

query: Public telephones kahan hain?
expected_response: Public telephone booths entrance ke qareeb aur departure lounge mein waqe hain

query: Kya airport par post office hai?
expected_response: Business hours ke doran main entrance ke qareeb ek chota postal service counter available hai

query: Intezar ke doran main TV kahan dekh sakta hoon?
expected_response: Khabrain aur flight information dikhane wali TV screens tamam gate seating areas mein hain

query: Kya koi massage services hain?
expected_response: Chair massage services Premium Lounge mein available hain

query: Customer service center kahan hai?
expected_response: Customer service aur complaint office main departure hall mein waqe hai

query: Kya main snacks aur drinks khareed sakta hoon?
expected_response: Snacks aur beverages bechne wali convenience stores tamam gate clusters ke qareeb hain

query: Lift aur escalators kahan hain?
expected_response: Elevators aur escalators terminal ke dono ends par waqe hain jo tamam floors ko connect karte hain

query: Kya health screening area hai?
expected_response: Health screening aur temperature check stations entrance aur security ke baad hain

query: Main apna boarding pass kahan print kar sakta hoon?
expected_response: Boarding pass print karne ke liye self-service kiosks check-in counters ke qareeb hain

query: Kya koi luxury brand shops hain?
expected_response: Luxury aur premium brand stores security ke baad duty-free area mein hain

query: Airline ticket office kahan hai?
expected_response: Airline ticket counters aur offices check-in area mein hain

query: Kya main apne jootay repair karwa sakta hoon?
expected_response: Quick shoe repair services kabhi kabhar shoeshine stands ke qareeb available hain

query: Vending machines kahan hain?
expected_response: Snacks aur drinks ke liye vending machines poore terminal mein waqe hain

query: Kya maon ke liye nursery room hai?
expected_response: Privacy aur facilities ke sath Gate 3 ke qareeb ek dedicated mother aur baby room available hai

query: Main flight information displays kahan se talash kar sakta hoon?
expected_response: Flight information display screens poore terminal aur tamam gates par hain

query: Kya koi jewelry shops hain?
expected_response: Jewelry aur accessories shops departure shopping area mein hain

query: Complaint aur feedback box kahan hai?
expected_response: Feedback forms aur complaint boxes customer service desks aur information counters par hain

query: Kya main apne credit card se VIP lounge tak access hasil kar sakta hoon?
expected_response: Kuch premium credit cards muft lounge access offer karte hain; lounge reception se check karein
